title: Lesson 15
paragraph: Communities and resources are strengthened through abundance, belonging, and sustainable actions. Entertaining, measuring, and transferring knowledge and functions help maintain a healthy and green society.

words.example: The region has abundant natural resources.

words.meaning: to be a member or part of something
words.example: She belongs to the local art club.

words.meaning: to maintain or support over time
words.example: We must sustain the environment for future generations.

words.japaneseMeaning: 思いとどまらせる、落胆させる
words.example: Poor results did not discourage her efforts.
The chef prepared a gourmet meal.

words.meaning: to move from one place or person to another
words.example: He transferred funds to his savings account.

words.meaning: to assess size, quantity, or quality
words.example: They measured the room dimensions accurately.

words.meaning: an activity or purpose natural to something
words.example: The function of the heart is to pump blood.
